s: The Kerplunk game from Hasbro is a classic, nerve-racking test of skill. Carefully pull out the sticks, but be sure not to dislodge the marbles or they'll come rolling down the chute! Finish with the fewest marbles and win! Start with basic Kerplunk and move on to more challenging games if you dare!
